capabilities: Multi-tenant database operations with organization isolation
Professional AI development tools (Zen MCP Server)
Azure AI services for CPA workflows (Form Recognizer, Text Analytics, OpenAI)
GitHub repository management and CI/CD workflows
Web automation and testing for CPA applications
CPA knowledge base and documentation management
API gateway management for multi-tenant platform
Technical documentation and tax code reference lookup
Real-time financial market data (stocks, forex, crypto, commodities)
Multi-asset trading and investment analysis (stocks, ETFs, options, futures)
Cryptocurrency trading and blockchain analytics (15k+ coins, 130+ networks)
Real estate property data and investment analysis (Zillow, Redfin)
SEC EDGAR filings and corporate regulatory compliance
Federal Reserve economic indicators and macroeconomic analysis
US Treasury fiscal data and government finance tracking
Algorithmic trading strategy development and backtesting
